examples: A screen reader will announce the name (label).
Voice control software will let the user say something like "click <name>" to activate the control.
A screen reader might be announce the role as "text input", "edit", "edit text", etc.
Voice control software will let the user say something like "click text box" to focus a the input.

assertions.title: convey the checked state
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to know if the checkbox is checked

assertions.title: convey the unchecked state
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to know if the checkbox is checked
examples: A screen reader might announce "unchecked" or imply that the element is not checked by not announcing the checked state at all.
